about.title: About Us
about.showeare: Ecomovil was born from a simple idea: make transportation more friendly with the environment, more affordable, and more sustainable. Founded by a group of college students in 2024, we've grown from a small project into a thriving community-driven marketplace.
about.whatareourmission: We're on a mission to revolutionize mobility by connecting students who want to buy, sell, or rent bikes, rollerskates, and skates, to all kind of people even if you are just a tourist you can be part of our project. we're not just saving students money â€“ we're creating a more sustainable future.

join.title: Join Ecomovil Today
join.journey: Start your journey towards sustainable transportation.

main.subtitle: Your marketplace for wheels and deals

whocanuse.title: Who can use Ecomovil?
whocanuse.list: List your bikes, rollerskates, or skates for sale or rent. Earn extra income!.
whocanuse.list2: Browse and buy or rent vehicles from student owners. Find great deals on campus transportation.
